profession: Aspiring AI Agent Engineer | Multi-Agent Systems
heroDescription: Training towards AI agent engineering and multi-agent systems. Solid foundation in software development and systems logic.
profileText1: Systems Engineering student with a clear vision towards AI agent engineering and multi-agent system orchestration. My goal is to design and coordinate specialized autonomous agents (backend, frontend, QA, documentation) that work together to produce complete software.
profileText2: I have a foundation in software development and programming logic. Currently in active training in Python, LLMs, agent frameworks (LangChain, CrewAI, MetaGPT), and local models with Ollama. Seeking opportunities where I can apply and deepen my knowledge in applied AI.
focus: Focus on AI, autonomous agents and multi-agent systems
project1Desc: Custom web system for costume rental management. Includes admin and employee panels, availability control, return tracking, and reports. Built from scratch starting with client interviews and requirements gathering.
project2Desc: Custom Android mobile app for a wholesale fruit business. Inventory management, purchase and sales tracking, and report generation. Built from client survey stage through requirements definition.
project3Title: AI Agent Orchestrator for Software Development
project3Desc: Multi-agent system where each agent fulfills a specialized role: PM (defines requirements), Architect (designs structure), Backend, Frontend, QA (tests), and Documentation. Agents communicate with each other and produce functional software from a natural language description. Uses local models with Ollama.
project4Desc: This very website: professional responsive CV with light/dark mode, internationalization (ES/EN), and GitHub Pages deployment.
project5Desc: Access control system for nightclubs using a fingerprint reader. Verifies identity and age against a centralized cloud database. Integrates with RENIEC AFIS API, offline mode, and supports multiple branches.
contactDescription: I'm interested in internships and positions related to AI and agents. Feel free to contact me!
footerTagline: Aspiring AI Agent Engineer | Multi-Agent Systems
footerNote: Responsive web CV with light/dark mode and internationalization
